titlealts.searchtitle: Data Element: NEWBORN BLOOD SPOT TEST OUTCOME STATUS CODE (CONGENITAL HYPOTHYROIDISM) - Description

div.p: NEWBORN BLOOD SPOT TEST OUTCOME STATUS CODE (CONGENITAL HYPOTHYROIDISM) is the same as attribute NEWBORN BLOOD SPOT TEST OUTCOME STATUS.
NEWBORN BLOOD SPOT TEST OUTCOME STATUS CODE (CONGENITAL HYPOTHYROIDISM) is the result of screening for Congenital Hypothyroidism (CHT).
